amendment.description: To require a Comptroller General to study on the features of successful personnel management systems of highly technical and scientific workforces.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1431 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1431 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Sessions. (consideration: CR S8738-8739; text: CR S8739) To require a Comptroller General to study on the features of successful personnel management systems of highly technical and scientific workforces.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1431 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1431 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Sessions.
